tika-s0403t6:2_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame “mahapphalā mahānisaṁsā”ti ubhayampetaṁ atthato ekaṁ, byañjanameva nānanti āha “mahapphalā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t6:2_3: Mahato lokuttarassa sukhassa paccayā hontīti mahānisaṁsā.
tika-s0403t6:2_4: Amatogadhāti amatabbhantarā amataṁ anuppaviṭṭhā nibbānadiṭṭhattā, tato paraṁ na gacchanti.
tika-s0403t6:2_8: Āhāre paṭikūlasaññāti āhāraṁ gamanādivasena paṭikūlato pariggaṇhantassa uppannasaññā.
tika-s0403t6:5_1: Chaṭṭhe saha ājīvanti etthāti sājīvo, pañhassa pucchanaṁ vissajjanañca.
